name: KittyGerms2
description:
KittyGerms 2 is a sequel to the original game, with many new features!

KittyGerms 2 adds new backgrounds, stories, cursors, and more!

The main story is that you, the player, are a cursor. But a naughty cat next door has got himself a very bad disease called Kitty Germs. He thinks it is funny to try and chase you... but here is the hard part. He gets faster at every level. And you have to try and live.

KittyGerms 3 might be coming Mid 2022

LEVEL EXPANSION PACK DLC COMING SOON!

MULTIPLE CURSOR DLC COMING SOON!
